title.text: RHBA-2019:1992: cloud-init bug fix and enhancement update (Moderate)

description.text:
The cloud-init packages provide a set of init scripts for cloud instances. Cloud instances need special scripts to run during initialization to retrieve and install SSH keys, and to let the user run various scripts.

Users of cloud-init are advised to upgrade to these updated packages.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2019-0816 cloud-init: extra ssh keys added to authorized_keys on the Azure platform

criterion.@comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
cloud-init is earlier than 0:18.5-1.el8.4
cloud-init is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
Red Hat CoreOS 4 is installed
